Label.en: Right! And it helped this vase get made! See, the blue colour on these vases comes from Iranian cobalt!

Label.en: Only peaceful and sustained trade through this empire could bring cobalt to China.

Label.en: China was a manufacturing powerhouse in those days, much like today! I guess “Made in China” has been a thing for centuries!
